Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class HSLLinear

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.HSLLinear
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class HSLLinear
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Luminance and saturation linear correction. The filter operates in HSL color space and provides with the facility of luminance and saturation linear correction - mapping specified channels' input ranges to specified output ranges.
